title.value: Assessment of initial material of meadow foxtail (Alopecurus pratensis L.) and development of interspecific hybrids with creeping meadow foxtail (Alopecurus Ventricosus Pers.)
Оценка исходного материала лисохвоста лугового (Alopecurus pratensis L.) и создание межвидовых гибридов с лисохвостом вздутым (Alopecurus ventricosus pers.)

journal.title: Arable Farming and Breeding in Belarus : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Lesko, V.A., Gomel Regional Agricultural Experimental Station (Belarus)
Stolepchenko, V.A., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for  Arable Farming

abstract.value: In course of the research there was studied a collection of meadow foxtail (Alopecurus pratensis L.). The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus on an experimental field of the Gomel Regional Agricultural Experimental Station (Belarus) on sod-podzolic sandy soil, spread by sandy loam. As a result of realized research the variety samples with high growth rates in the first year of vegetation were determined, meadow foxtail varieties with high feed productivity were isolated (Rassvet (Primorye Territory), Alatlyani (Nungary), Rg-782 (Canada), creeping meadow foxtail Dovskij). Viable interspecific hybrids of meadow foxtail (Alopecurus pratensis) with creeping meadow foxtail (Alopecurus ventricosus), which fodder and seed productivity exceeded initial parental forms, were obtained. Productivity of variety samples of meadow foxtail at haying mode of use was presented. Productivity of creation of interspecific hybrids of meadow foxtail with creeping meadow foxtail and their fodder and seed productivity were shown.
